kjv_def: cause grief, grieve, be in heaviness, (be) sorrow(-ful), be (make) sorry
strongs_def: to distress; reflexively or passively, to be sad
outline:
1. to make sorrowful
  2. to affect with sadness, cause grief, to throw into sorrow
  3. to grieve, offend
  4. to make one uneasy, cause him a scruple
